/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. Trees and bushes dot the landscape, providing a touch of greenery and contrast to the urban environment. A blue car is parked on the side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and the street. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of modern architecture and natural elements.
